remarks: The exponentials of two imaginary numbers are equal iff their sine and cosine components are equal.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 15-Mar-2008.)
statement: efieq $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) = ( exp ` ( _i x. B ) ) <-> ( ( cos ` A ) = ( cos ` B ) /\ ( sin ` A ) = ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) $.
